Class TaskList

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.TaskList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class TaskList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class containing a list of Task objects.

      • totalTimeUsed

        public double totalTimeUsed()
        Gets double representation of total hours spent on tasks
        Returns:
        the double information containing total hours spent on Task objects

      • isDone

        public boolean isDone()
        Gets a boolean representation of every Task being done
        Returns:
        the boolean containing information after comparing every Task's isDone field inside List

      • addTask

        public void addTask​(Task task)
        Adds a Task to the list if there is no other existing Task with the same ID inside List.
        Parameters:
        task - the task to be added

        Parameters:
        taskID - the id of the Task object to be removed

      • copy

        public TaskList copy()
        Gets a copy of an existing TaskList.
        Returns:
        new TaskList with the copies of existing Tasks inside TaskList

      • size

        public int size()
        Gets how many Task objects are inside the TaskList.
        Returns:
        the number of Task objects inside the TaskList

      • get

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Removes evey task inside TaskList. Used when clearing TaskLists inside Employees while moving Project to archive.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Gets a String representation of the TaskList
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the String containing information about all Task objects in the list - each Task object followed by a new line character
